entry.title: My Beautiful Test 42
entry.content:
42

My first day at work was a complete success !

I’ve trained my droid to eat apples :)

entry.content:

Some code:

var hello = function (name) {
  console.log("Hello, " + name + '.');
}
hello('World');   // prints 'Hello, World.' to stdout

Some more code

def test
  @answer = 6*9
  if @answer != 42  # this should never happen
    raise "Oh no, not again."
  else
    print "Don't panic."
end
